fullplot: Two friends that call each other Gerry decide to hide in the wilderness in order to see something. However, they do not find what they're looking for. They decide to return to the car but they get lost in the desert, without water, supplies or a compass. Now they have to walk, trying to find the road to survive.
plot: A friendship between two young men is tested when they go for a hike in a desert and forget to bring any water or food with them.
title: Gerry

tomatoes.consensus: The type of uncompromising film that divides filmgoers over whether it is profound or pretentious.
